name: DAG 上的 DP
complexity: O(V+E) for DAG traversal, but depends on problem-specific state and transitions
scenarios: Problems that can be modeled as a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) where states have partial order and no cycles
Problems with transitive dependencies (e.g., scheduling, layering, topological ordering)
extensions: Combining with other DP techniques (e.g., bitmask, tree DP)
